name: 中英句法比較分析
comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description: This course is intended to explore the workings of Universal Grammar by comparing the syntax of Chinese and the syntax of English (as well as other languages when necessary). Important topics in syntax will be discussed by covering both classical and up-to-date works. With the goal to enhance the understanding of Universal Grammar, this course will benefit not only students who are interested in syntactic theory, Chinese and English syntax, but also those working on interfaces between syntax and other linguistic areas (such as sentence processing, L1 or L2 acquisition, etc.).
goals: to explore the workings of Universal Grammar by comparing the syntax of Chinese and the syntax of English (as well as other languages when necessary).
